Review.Contenu: The selection process is totally opaque. The decision is not supported by valid reasons.The results take very long. That's understandable because you might be handling high volume.

Review.Titre: I got an offer and everything within…
Review.Contenu: I got an offer and everything within one hour. Amazing 🤩

Mr. Adil and the Shortlistd.io team swiftly connected me with a job within a week. Their professionalism and efficiency were impressive. The entire team exudes a high level of expertise and support, making the recruitment process seamless. I highly recommend this firm for their personalized and effective approach to job placement. Grateful for their assistance!

Review.Titre: Great user experience. Just landed a job
Review.Contenu: I recently joined the shortlistd.io platform after successfully completing their verification process. The platform matched me with a job that aligns perfectly with my experience, which I had highlighted on my CV. I submitted my application and received prompt feedback from the company. They scheduled a screening call to determine if I was a good fit for the role.During the interview, I found that my goals, skillset, and experience were a great match for the company's needs. At the end of the interview, they informed me that I would hear from them soon. To my delight, I received an email just two days later, confirming that I had been offered the job!I'd like to give a special shout-out to the founder, Adil Gwiazdowski. His support and guidance throughout the process were invaluable. If you're a software engineer seeking excellent remote job opportunities, I highly recommend trying out shortlistd.io

Review.Titre: Best platform and perfect client match
Review.Contenu: Shortlistd is focused, easy and straightforward. It eliminates unnecessary from filling that I was able to provide all my details and complete my profile in few minutes.I was able to find 100% perfect match client that matches my qualifications and expectations.It is the best platform I have ever used to land a job.

Quality of experience for both candidates and employers. Shortlistd.io is laser focused on quality over quantity - this is important for everyone involved in the hiring process.From a candidates perspective, it couldn't be easier - upload your CV/Resume, answer some additional questions around preferences etc, and you're done. No double entry of data.

Review.Titre: I had a fantastic experience using…
Review.Contenu: I had a fantastic experience using shortlisted.io, from connecting me with the right opportunities to supporting me through the entire interview process. For the excellence and attention to details that goes into the service they provide, I'm more than happy to recommend their platform to anyone.

In a world where companies have to review hundreds of resumes to find a few suitable candidates, this is a refreshingly efficient source of good candidates that were already vetted by industry leaders.

My talent representative stood by me throughout the recruiting process, providing valuable tips and feedback, and even helped me negotiate my offer. The overall experience was excellent, and I would highly recommend this company to anyone looking to land their next job.
My best personal experience ever was with shortlist.io. I found creativity, brilliance, and clarity in their approach. Also, great attention to customers, speed and flexibility of communication.
